lx4p

Class LXENTTEC

  • java.lang.Object
    • lx4p.LXDMXInterface
      • lx4p.LXENTTEC

  • public class LXENTTEC
extends LXDMXInterface
    LXDMXENTTEC.java

    LXENTTEC partially implements the ENTTEC DMX USB Pro API v1.44

      • sendDMX

        public void sendDMX(processing.serial.Serial sPort)
        send a ENTTEC_LABEL_SEND_DMX request to widget using the serial port

        This should cause the widget to output dmx from its dmx port.

        Parameters:
        sPort - An open serial port
